name: Theoton
description:
Theotonis a strategic platformer, or a turnbased platformer...

Honestly i don't know my self, and i made it!

But it is a game and it's finished so i am posting it here.

So plan, jump and shoot 16 levels and fight the boss.

Why you ask?

For the plot of course.

And when your done please post some feedback.

First made for ludum dare 36
